author: AP
title: Dolphins turn to Zoom to connect with 8 newly acquired free agents
description: The Miami Dolphins set up media interviews via Zoom for their eight newly acquired free agents with players that are currently unable to be in Florida.
content:
MIAMI (AP) As linebacker Kyle Van Noy visited with reporters for the first time since joining the Miami Dolphins, he wore headphones not for noise canceling, but to hear the questions.
Because of the new coronavirus, the Dolphins arranged media interviews vi… [+3343 chars]
